sense.def:
One's mood
so človekova čustva v nekem trenutku.

seg.quote: He was always in a good mood.
I wasn't in the mood for helping.

sense.def:
Kadar je človek
in a mood
, je jezen in nestrpen.

seg.quote: When Chris was in one of his moods, he was unpleasant to everyone.

sense.def:
The mood of a group of people
so splošni občutki ali stališča skupine ljudi.

seg.quote: The debate took place amid a mood of growing political despair.
The mood of this week's meeting has been one of cautious optimism.
